citation: Proclamation under the Water and Sewerage Corporation Act 2012 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Water and Sewerage Corporation Act 2012

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Water and Sewerage Corporation Act 2012 fix â€“

        (a) 1 March 2013 as the day on which the provisions of that Act, except section 44 and Schedule 2 , commence; and
        (b) 1 July 2013 as the day on which section 44 and Schedule 2 of that Act commence.
18 February 2013

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

S. BACON

Minister for Finance

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 February 2013

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
